div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die octobris

the samyn day the ballieis assignit this day aucht dais to
William gareauche to ansuer to the borghe strekit apon him
be Jonhne portar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xvij s'
g' squar' money

The samyn day Will philp was quyt of the pament of
Scottis money of the Some follouit be Dauid Duffous'
contenit in ane decrete

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Robertus
masone est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam
nicholaij masone patris suj

The said day it was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis consale
and communite that the millaris and takismen and fermoraris of tham
sal haue in multer the mesoure xxtj mesour of the quhet
and ry Ande of malt the xxiiij mesour' as the lovable'
vys' has bene tymes bigan

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit Jonhne malis
Androw branche to pay to Jonhne malysone xvj s' g' and
viii g' flandris' money within terme of law becaus' the said
Androw falyeit't' overwrites 'n'.ge in the deposicion of his aithe eftir the
tenor of the akis maid tharapone obefore

the said day Androw branche allegit and schew that he was al tym redy and than
offerit him redy to fulfill and do al thingis that he was ordanit be ane assis'
contenit in the ak deliuerit of the clame of xvj s' g' and viii g' be Jhon' malison and offerit
him to preyf that as efferis protestand' quhat thinge the officiaris did atour this suld'
turne him to nay preiudice
assedacio molendinorum marco Scot

the said' day the aldirman balyeis Consal and communite warnit
be the hand bell throu the hall tone ande gatherit present
for the tyme gravntit ande Sett to mark Scot his
assignais nay grantis tham him Selff subtennentis ande helpis
al thar myllis vuer' myll nethir myll and the tua Justice
myllis for nyne yeris entirand at the next martimes in winter
payand' yerlie xl merkis penny mall defalkand' him fiwe
markis at the first martimes terme to byg the said' myllis
he bigand' tham and luvand' tham sufficientlie biggit at his
vsche of his termes And' the said' aldirman balyeis consal and communite
helping' to dicht and rede the common' loghe' of the tovne that
the wattir may haue passage to the said' myllis

div.head: Copia assedacionis molendinorum facta marco scot
div.p:
Be it kend' til ale men be thir present lettres vs aldirman balyeis Consale and communite
of Abirdene to haue Sette and to ferme lattyn and be thir present lettris Settis and to ferme
lattis to our nichbur' mark scot ale and hail our myllis vuer myle and nethir myle
and the tua Justece millis with thar pertinence for ale the termes of nyne yeris To
be haldin and had ale and hail our said myllis with thar pertinence to the said' mark
his assignez auay gretar' tham him self Induelaris of the said' burgh' subtennentis and
helpis with ale and sindrie multouris fredomis comoditeis asiamentis and proffitis
pertening or may perten'g tharto the entre of the said' mark salbe in and the said'
myllis at martimes In vinter nixt eftir folouing the dait of thir lettres and frahinfurthe
to continewe in Josing and bruking the sammyn quhil ale the termes of nyne
yeris be fullely complet and runing but ony interrupcion or brek of termez or
yeris Impediment or demavnd' to be maid' in the contrar' the said' mark his
assignais forsaid' subtennentis or helpis payand' yerly to vs and our assignez' fourty merkis
vsuale money of Scotland' of maile at tua vsual termes in the yer martymes in vinter
ande wit be evinly porcionis alanerlie for al vthir deu seruice that may be askit or requirit
tharof Induringe the said' termes Ande atour the sale wit vs to haf defalkit remittit
and gevin to the said' mark fywe merkis of the first trinites terme to the reperacione
and bigyne of the said' myllis and als' the said mark sale vpmak and byge the said'
myllis sufficienlie as efferis and leyf wele biggit at the vschey of his termes
for said' and we the said' AdirmanAldirman balyeis counsale and communite sal vacand' kep and defend'
the said' myllis with thar pertinence to the said' mark his assignez na gretar' than him self
Subtennentis and helpis for al the termes of nyne yeris as said' is agannis ale dedlie ale
fraud and gile avay put In witnes of the quhilkis we haue appensit our' comone Salle
to thir lettres at Abirdene the xvi day of the monetht of october the yer of god' a thowsand' foir hundricht
nynty and tua yeris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die octobris
Anno quo supra

The said' day Walter auchneywe Alexander gray Williame
andirsone eldar Androw murray yongar and Jonhne portar
was chosin with consent and assent of Jhone grige one
that ane part Ande Williame scherar one that vthir parte
ande suorne the gret aithe to decide determe ende
and conclude the clame of iij li' scottis money follouit
be the saide Jhone apone the saide William Scherare
quhilk he pait to Jonhne Stronoche burges of montros'
And' the said partiis was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis
thar handis vphaldin to stand' at the decret and deliuerance
of the said' personis arbitouris and summisouris chosin
and suorne in the said' thingis and thai to deliuer in the samyn
eftir thar' aithis knaulege but ony reuocacion fraude
or gile

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die octobris
anno quo supra

the said day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to thomas mar'
to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be murthow glenmaluyn for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of Sevin li'

The said day the ballieis assignit this day gert call Jonhne
gilespy to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be murthou
glenmaluyn for the wranguis' haldin fra him of v crovnis
Scottis money for ane mannis hyer' feit and pait in his defalt
and for the wranguis' haldin fra him of x s' g' licht money
for ij hidis And' becaus' he was lauchfully warnit callit
and nocht comperit the ballieis ordanit thomas Jameson' officiar'
to pas' ande tak ane streys' of the said Jhonnis and lat it
to borghe' gif it be askit and warne him to this day xv
dais to ansuer' to the said' borghe

The saide day Robert moire was quyt be ane suorne assis'
Jonhne moire forspekar of ane Schipe follouit be thomas
narne

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
prat forspekar that Robert Crage Alexander gray Jhon' low Jhone
thomsone mathow branche Androw Watson' and Robert of Culan
sal ger Jonhne lammyngghton' be pait of jc iijxx and v li'
of talche of the haile gudis beinge in the schip of vntaleon'

The said' day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
prat forspekar that William gareauche sal content and pay to Jonhne
portar' xvij s' g' squair' money and his avnter gane to be pait
her' within terme of law

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die octobris
Anno quo supra

The said day mathow toschow follouit Jonhne of greyne and his wyf
for the wranguis' resett of his douchtir and gudis quhilk thai denyit
and in continent the said action' was put to the decision' of the personis
vndir writin chosin in ane assis' and suorne that is to say henrik
hourum Alexander traile Androw louson thome rolland Jhon' barbour Dauid
spens thomas narne James andirson' and cristy prat quhilkis riplie
avisit the richtis resonis and allegacionis of batht the said partiis producit herde
and vndirstandin thai fand and deliuerit the saide Jonhne greyne and his
wyf quyt of al resett Resset of the said' mathouis douchtir
and his gudis be the moutht of the said' henrik forspekar of the
said' assis' And' the saide mathow in Amerciament of the court for the wrang
uis' borghe' strekin one the said Jonhne and his wyf Ande gevin
for dome be the moutht of Jhon' Williamsone dempstar of the court

The said day It was deliuerit be the saide assis' henry hourum
forspekar that Androu Wentone sal mak gud fatht be his cownt
buk how mekil that mathou toschow is avand' him and say mekle'
as he deponis be his aithe the said mathou sal pay him to giddir
with iij s' that the said mathow grantit avand' him Ande the saide
androw deponit he is avand' him xviij s'

The saide day Robert evinson' follouit Dauid mar' for the wranguis'
takin fra him of ane Caldrone quhilkis the said Dauid denyit
and in continent the said action' was put to the decisione of the
saide assis' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aithez suorne
fand and deliuerit the saide Dauid mar quyt of the takin of the saide
Caldrone be the moutht of henry hourum forspekar of the said assis'
And' the said Robert in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borghe' strekin one the
said' Dauid gevin for dome be the moutht of Jhon' Williamson' dempstar
Ande thai ordanit the said Robert to pay iiij s' to thome Jameson and
Sandy allansone and thai to deliuer the said caldrone to the said Robert

The said day henry bavne follouit Alexander lame wobstar for the
wranguis' spillinge of ane wob of lynnyn clath of his quhilkis
wantyt fiwe eln' as he allegit Ande for the ourlange haldin
of the saide wob atour the day that he promittit it to him quhilkis
the said Alexander denyit Ande in continent the said action' was put with
thar consentis to the decision' of ane assis' quhilkis riplie avisit be thar'
aithis fand' the saide Alexander quyt of the spillinge of the said wob
and haldin of the clath thomas mar' forspekar

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio antepenultimo die octobris
Anno quo supra

the said' day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander rede forspekar
that Jonhne Kintor sal pay to Jonhne litstar' of the greyne xvj s'
Scottis money

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas mar'
forspekar that Wat atkin is avand' x s' to henry hourum to be
pait within terme of law

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die nouem
bris Anno quo supra

the saide day Ellene the wyf of Jonhne blak tuk one
hir to send word to the saide Jonhne ande bringe his ansuer
to the ballieis this day xv dais anent ane barrel and the fill of demi
of Salmond follouit be Androw lichtone for the tak of
half ane nethis fischingis of the furdis Sett to the saide
Jonhne

Eodem die henricus hourum deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes menyeis
ballivus erit Indempnis pro Andrea branche aliter quam per viam Juris Et
thomas narne deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnis
pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per viam iuris Et quolibet dictarum parcium alteri
fideiussoribus suis obligatur ad releuandum ipsos de huiusmodi fideiussioribus

The said day Androw chamer was callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe' strekit one be thomas Waus for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of compt rekning and pament of the waringe
of ane barrel of beif and x s' Scottis money eftir the tenor' of
the said' borghe herfor the balyeis chargit thomas Jamesone to
warne him agan friday to Ansuer to the saide borghe

The said day Jonhne Wormet was lauchfullie Callit and nocht
Comperit to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him for the wranguislie
haldin fra him Will Kintore of ane langsadill tharfor the ballieis ordanit philp
Dunbrek to pas' ande tak ane Streys' fra the said Jhon' and
warne him to this day xv dais to the said borghe' as secunde
day of proces'

The said day thomas Jamesone at commavnd' of Jhone' menyes
balye chargit Androw branche to remane within the tolbutht quhil
he pait to Jonhne malisone xvj s' g' and viij g'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjmo die nouembris
Anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas litilJonhne deuenit plegius per ostensionem manus
sue quod Jacobus henrisone commorans in Dunbulge apud strabogy
non exibit ad montes cum animalibus vsque ad festum Sancti michaelis
sub pena Juris et pro tribus duodenis ceporum preposito soluend' infra
huic et festum Natiuitatis proximo futuro

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Andree amfrason'
div.p:
Thomas mar Andreas murray senior Willelmus portar gilbertus
chamer thomas Waus Dauid mar patricius andirsone Johannes
portar Robertus evinsone Johannes lammyntone Johannes chapman
Dauid gichtan githtane et Richardus bernys burgenses dicti burgi
dicunt quod quondam magister Willelmus vmfray obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de Croftis et terris subscriptis Jacentibus infra libertatem burgi
de Abirdene de vno crofto le braide Croft vocato Jacente ad finem
vici furcarum inter terram quondam Alexandri houysone ex australi et terram
siue croftum ecclesie cathedralis Abirdonensis ex boreali et communiones vias regias
versus oriens et occidens Et de vno crofto apud le spittale inter
le myeris ex orientali et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali et croftum
ecclesie cathedralis Abirdonensis versus austrum et boriam de vno paruo crofto
ex orientali parte eiusdem burgi inter terram Andree murray ex boreali et terram
fratrum predicatorum ex australi et communiones vias regias versus austrum oriens et
boriam occidens Et de vno paruo Crofto le Sandedaill inter terram
andree ancroft ex boreali et terram hered' quondam Willelmi fechat ex
australi et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod
Andreas vmfray frater suus et legittimus et propinquior heres dicti fratris
suj de predictis croftis et legittime etatis et cetera nunc existunt in manibus Regis
per annum et dicti aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis
et valent per annum duas marcas

The saide day comperit Androw litstar and brocht with him
four s' and ix d' that he was avande to Jonhne thomson'
In the nayme of thomas litstar' and his barnis as is contenit
in the ak of his avne gravnt maid' obefore quhilk siluer
he left in the clerkis handis to the profit fo the saide Jhon'
thomson becaus' he refusit It and wald nocht resaue it

Eodem die Johannes blak obligauit se per manus et bona
ad conseruandum Duncanum talyour Indempnem de omnibus
annuis redditibus per ipsum de terra sua in vico furcarum
receptis et recipiendis

the samyn day the aldirman and consal present for the tyme
assignit to Androw Culane and James Colison x markis
of thar' wattir malys for the office of Abbat of bona
cord' to be excersit this yer' als' honorabily as
thai cane for the wourschip of the tovne agan the cumin
of our Souerane lorde and the lordis of Consale

The Antepennult Day of nouember' forsaide the aldirman ballieis and Consale present for
the tyme grantit and ordanit Thomas prat and Jonhne Wormet
keparis of the commone Sele to seile the Indenturis mad
to Robert huchosone Sangastar with the commone Sele
of the conducinge of him for al the dais of his lyve and
the said Robert huchosone purchest with Instance the Sele of ane
honorabil man Robert blinsele to be affixit to the tothir part of the
Indenture Remaning with the tovne

In primisThis list is situated on the right half of this page and on the left side of the next page. The page appears to have been folded in half at some point. In a box a chartir of the selling
of the toune of the Crois sald be John'
banerman to the toune of Abirdene
Item a chartir of John' banerman of ailsik the watir
toune to the saide Johne banerman made of
the crois sald til him for vij xx merkis
Item a plane chartir of Johne banerman of
ailsik selland the same ton' til the
toune of Abirdene
Item a confirmacion of the saidis chartiris
Item a chartir of the kingis of the sam toune
Item a chartir of Sanct lowies and sanct
Ninianis altar
Item a lettre vndir the kingis gret seil to eschete
al wol hide and skyn that gais oute of
the fredome
Item a lettre of the changing of the fayr fra
the trinite day to Sanct michalis day de
monte tumba vndir the kingis gret Seil
Item a lettre vndir the sam Seil of the freing
of the custum of lentirwar' futevel and vthir sic
Item a chartir of the assedacion of the burgh of
Abirdene in feuferme vndir king Robertis gret
Seil Item ane vthir in the sam fourm
Item a chartir of king Alexander of the market
and vthiris fredomis grantit to the ton' of Abirdene
Item a chartir of king Robert of the landis of
Rubbislaw and of the Deneburn of the Infeft
ment made til Androw of Insture
Item a chartir of king Robert of assise of
the ail and of fische rede and quhite
Item a chartir of king Robert of the keping
of the forest of the stoket with the pertinentis
Item a chartir of king Wilyam that the communite
of abirdene salbe fre of the tol of thare
catallis in al merkatis and faris to landwart
Item ane vthir in the same fourme
Item a chartir of king Robert approvand al
fredomis and richtis that the burges and communite of
abirdene was infeft with of before / with power
totak / presone and punyse al thaim that cumis
armyt within the said burgh again the kingis statutis
Item ane vthir in the same fourm
Item a chartir of the sam king of licence tobig
ane tolbuthe
Item a protection of the king Alexander of the burgh and
burgez of Abirdene
Item a lettre of king Dauid that bischop Alexander
of Abirdene Renuncit al process' maide be him
anent the tendis of the mylnys of Abirdene
Item j chartir of king James the thrid of
ane discharge of the Custome of Salmond'
to the burges of Abirdene et cetera

The saide dayThis is a continuation of the business on page 364. the aldirman and thir personis of Consale vndirwritin
That is to say Robert blinsele Jonhne of Knollis thomas prat
Alexander rede Jonhne Wormet Androw Culane eldar Alexander chamer
yongar thomas fyf Androw branche Williame blinsele Jonhne
blak Dauid part Androw murray eldar Robert Crage ande
William Kintor grantit for plesour ofo our Souerane lorde
and honor of the towne to gyf In propine to oure
Souerane lorde this tyne at his f cumyne In wyne
x crovnis In wax tene crovnis and tene crovnis
In spice Ande has ordanit the balyeis to gif acqui
tance vndir thar' Selis of the wattir malys and
landis for the pament of the saide xxxti crovnis
vnto the tyme the aldirman balyeis and consale eftir
the kingis passage sytt se and considir quhar the
saide Some may be gottyne of the commone
gudis of the said burghe' to the frethin of the
saide malys sua that the kinge and the lordis'
may be pait Sene the saide propine is gevin In
the nayme of the haile towne
